thread.title: Johnny Manziel reportedly gets engaged to model girlfriend
thread.title_full: Johnny Manziel reportedly gets engaged to model girlfriend | New York Post

author: Joe Tacopino
title: Johnny Manziel reportedly gets engaged to model girlfriend
text:
Troubled quarterback Johnny Manziel reportedly got engaged to marry his model girlfriend.
The former NFL player, who is attempting to make a career comeback, asked the stunning Bre Tiesi to be his wife, according to TMZ .
The two started dating last year and have been posting a number of adorable selfies on Instagram.
“When you find a girl as amazing as I did that saved me from where I was in my life, you absolutely put a ring on it.” Manziel told the web site.
Manziel missed the entire 2016 NFL season but is currently drawing interest from teams and hopes to hit the gridiron again.
He could face a suspension for violating the NFL’s personal conduct policy stemming from a domestic violence indictment that took place last May.
The charges could be dismissed if Manziel agrees to complete an anger management course and a substance abuse program.
